node.title: 'Wait and see': Anxious Forbes residents watch floodwaters rise
node.alt: A building with floodwater covering the bottom
node.description: After days of preparationsÂ and evacuations, the community of Forbes in the central west is awaiting a likely 10.65 metre flood peak.
node.content:
["The State Emergency Service says its flood response in NSW central-west town of Forbes is now entering a \"wait and see\"\u00a0phase, as anxious residents watch the town's swollen river continue to rise.", "The Lachlan River is expected to reach a major flood level of 10.55 metres in the early hours of Wednesday, with a second peak of 10.65m likely in the afternoon.", "An evacuation order is now in place over 800 low-lying properties around Forbes.", "There is an evacuation centre set up at the St. Andrew's Presbyterian Church on Harold Street.", "SES incident controller Barry Griffiths said it was difficult to predict exactly how high the river would rise.", "\"There is a lot of variables on the flood plain which may bring different results into it, so that's why we've taken the precautions that we have,\" he said.", "The river upstream at Nanami exceeded the heights seen during the devastating 2016 floods, with levels holding steady at 12.38 metres on Tuesday morning.", "", "
Forbes restaurant owner Kevin Chen said he is a \"bit nervous\" about the coming days.(ABC News: Jake Lapham)
", "
Residents prepared with sandbags
", "Not all residents are following the order to evacuate.", "Bruce Howard has called Forbes home since 1984, and lived through several floods.", "Although he lives in one of the evacuation areas, he isn't leaving.", "", "
The 1990 flood didn't impact Bruce Howard's property, and he's confident he'll be safe again.(ABC News: Xanthe Gregory)
", "Jo Roberts also lives in a low-lying property\u00a0and is staying put.", "\"We're all prepared, we've got everything up that we need to have up, we're sandbagged \u2014\u00a0hopefully we don't need that,\" she said.", "", "
Jo Roberts said while some Forbes residents are anxious, most are prepared.(ABC News: Jake Lapham)
", "
Dam overflowing
", "Forbes Shire Council Mayor, Cr Phyllis Miller urged the community to not be complacent.", "Cr Miller said Forbes always had ample warning for floods, and people had\u00a0been making the most of the time to water-proof their properties.\u00a0", "The flood is being intensified by the release\u00a0of thousands of megalitres from the Wyangala Dam upstream and the swollen Lachlan tributary, the Belubula River.", "", "
The Lachlan River is expected to peak on Wednesday afternoon.(ABC News: Jake Lapham)
", "On Monday, Water NSW spokesman Tony Webber said inflows to dam had\u00a0been significant and made a tough situation harder.", "\"What made this more challenging was the dam was already full \u2014 we pulled it down where we could,\" Mr Webber said.", "Mr Webber said the authority would now work to lower the dam back to 100 per cent capacity by mid-week to provide some space for the next round of rainfall.", "", "
Residents of Forbes have been sand bagging low-lying properties with flood waters now expected to peak on Wednesday.(ABC Central West: Xanthe Gregory)
"]
